purpleculture_pinyin:
xī
to extinguish; to put out (fire); to quench; to stop burning; to go out (of fire, lamp etc); to come to an end; to wither away; to die out; Taiwan pr. [xi2]
тушить; потушить (пожар); тушить; перестать гореть; погаснуть (из огня, лампы и т. д.); прийти к концу; увядать; вымирать; Тайвань пр. [xi2]
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: To end 息 a flame 火; 息 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
熄灭 [ xī miè ]: to stop burning; to go out (of fire); to die out; extinguished
熄灯 [ xī dēng ]: turn out the lights; lights out
熄火 [ xī huǒ ]: (of fire, lamp etc) to go out; to put out (fire); (fig.) to die down; (of a vehicle) to stall
吹熄 [ chuī xī ]: to blow out (a flame)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 火 [ huǒ ] fire, flame; to burn; anger, rage
    • 息 [ xī ] to end, to cease, to put a stop to; pause, breath, rest; news
heisig_chinese_memo: With strong enough breath you can put out any fire.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a fire (火) would make your breath (息) cease
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: With strong enough breath you can put out any fire.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " fire " to " breath ", " breath " also sounds. "Shuowen" thinks that " extinguishing " means not only storing fire but also extinguishing fire, but in ancient books only the use of fire fighting is seen. "Said Wen": "Extinguish the animal fire. From the fire, stop the sound. It is also called extinguishing." " Extinguish " means to put out an example such as "Mencius. "Gao Zi Shang": "He who is benevolent today can still save a car's fire with a glass of water; if it is not extinguished, it is said that water is invincible." "Song History. "Five Elements": "It's the month, the Huizhou fire, night burns Zhouzhi, Qiaolou, official houses, prisons, money and treasury. As for Ren Yin, Nai Xi."

" Extinguish " means death and stop. Such as "Mencius. "Li Louxia": "The king's trace goes out and the "Poem" is dead." "Salt and Iron Theory. "Yao Ya": "Zhou Dao declines, Wang Ji extinguishes, princes fight for power, big and small rivals.
humanum_short_description_en: From " fire " to " breath ", " breath " also sounds. "Shuowen" thinks that " extinguishing " means not only storing fire but also extinguishing fire, but in ancient books only the use of fire fighting is seen.
humanum_full_description:
從「火」從「息」，「息」亦聲。《說文》以為「熄」既表示蓄火，亦表示滅火，但古書中只見滅火的用法。《說文》：「熄，畜火也。从火，息聲。亦曰滅火。」「熄」表示滅火的例子如《孟子．告子上》：「今之為仁者，猶以一杯水救一車薪之火也；不熄，則謂之水不勝火。」《宋史．五行志》：「是月，徽州大火，夜燔州治、譙樓、官舍、獄宇、錢帑庫務，凡十有九所，五百二十餘區，延燒千五百家，自庚子至于壬寅，乃熄。」

　　「熄」引申表示消亡、停止。如《孟子．離婁下》：「王者之迹熄而《詩》亡。」《鹽鐵論．繇役》：「周道衰，王迹熄，諸侯爭強，大小相凌。」
humanum_short_description: 從「火」從「息」，「息」亦聲。《說文》以為「熄」既表示蓄火，亦表示滅火，但古書中只見滅火的用法。

從「 火 」從「 息 」，「 息 」亦聲。《說文》以為「 熄 」既表示蓄火，亦表示滅火，但古書中只見滅火的用法。《說文》：「熄，畜火也。从火，息聲。亦曰滅火。」「 熄 」表示滅火的例子如《孟子．告子上》：「今之為仁者，猶以一杯水救一車薪之火也；不熄，則謂之水不勝火。」《宋史．五行志》：「是月，徽州大火，夜燔州治、譙樓、官舍、獄宇、錢帑庫務，凡十有九所，五百二十餘區，延燒千五百家，自庚子至于壬寅，乃熄。」 「 熄 」引申表示消亡、停止。如《孟子．離婁下》：「王者之迹熄而《詩》亡。」《鹽鐵論．繇役》：「周道衰，王迹熄，諸侯爭強，大小相凌。」
From " fire" to " breath", " breath" also sounds. "Shuowen" thinks that " extinguishing" means not only storing fire but also extinguishing fire, but in ancient books only the use of fire fighting is seen. "Said Wen": "Extinguish the animal fire. From the fire, stop the sound. It is also called extinguishing." " Extinguish" means to put out an example such as "Mencius. "Gao Zi Shang": "He who is benevolent today can still save a car's fire with a glass of water; if it is not extinguished, it is said that water is invincible." "Song History. "Five Elements": "It's the month, the Huizhou fire, night burns Zhouzhi, Qiaolou, official houses, prisons, money and treasury. As for Ren Yin, Nai Xi." " Extinguish" means death and stop. Such as "Mencius. "Li Louxia": "The king's trace goes out and the "Poem" is dead." "Salt and Iron Theory. "Yao Ya": "Zhou Dao declines, Wang Ji extinguishes, princes fight for power, big and small rivals.
